Name: Orchard.SEO
AntiForgery: enabled
Author: JCF
Website: http://orchardproject.net
Version: 1.0.4
OrchardVersion: 1.5
Description: A SEO module tool
Features:
    Orchard.SEO:
        Description: Inject description and kewords meta tags into the pages head section.
        Name: Adds SEO "Description" and "Kewords" Meta Tags
        Category: Content
